name: Blink Media Works
overview:
Blink is a unique production agency that creates effective, high quality video. Specifically we have expertise in producing TV commercials, targeted investor relations videos and video training tools. Blink goes a step beyond other agencies by completing your marketing strategy with the right distribution package for your video.

Blink is based in Vancouver, BC, Canada with a 1000 sq ft studio and full time creative team. In addition to corporate and commercial video, Blink also produces a television show, radio show and magazine from its downtown location.

We pride ourselves on keeping the customerâ€™s objective and story top of mind. Whether youâ€™re attracting customers, investors, training employees or improving your online presence, Blink has a solution thatâ€™s right for you.
